Content: *p67748a01228*12	section banswer all the questions. write your answers in the spaces provided.19	 ethanol can be made in industry by the reaction of ethene with steam, using  a phosphoric(v) acid catalyst.ch2=ch2(g) + h2o(g) ⇌ ch3ch2oh(g)       δrh = −45 kj mol−1	the reaction is carried out at 300°c and 60 atm. an initial yield of 5 % is achieved when the ethene and steam first pass through the reactor.	(a)	 explain the chemical reasons for the conditions used and why such a  low initial yield is acceptable in the industrial process.(6)*
